settings.title: AAI Webinars
settings.subtitle: Explore our live and on-demand webinars to enhance your knowledge and skills in aviation safety and training.

settings.webinar_title: The Future of Aviation Safety Training
settings.webinar_description: Join industry leaders as they discuss the evolving landscape of aviation safety training and the technologies shaping its future.
A comprehensive workshop on effective Crew Resource Management techniques for pilots and cabin crew.

settings.title: Interested in Presenting?
settings.text: We are always looking for experts to share their insights. If you have a topic you'd like to present, let us know!
